document_data.name: Ryndalla Cuttail
document_data.mainbody: a wererat, Ryndalla had white-gray fur.
document_data.Description: As a wererat, Ryndalla had white-gray fur.
document_data.History: Ryndalla lived in Wheloon Prison with her gang of fellow wererats, and they were forced from their hideout by the [[Night Brigade]] under [[Storna Harnwood]], who turned it into a [[Temple of Shar (Wheloon)|Temple of Shar]]. After narrowly escaping from the clutches of [[Agarta the Breaker]] and her arena, Ryndalla helped organize a counterattack with the surviving Rats against the [[Battlemaster's Arenas]]. She sent a team guided in by [[Martildae]] in order to rescue any captive Riverside Rats, resulting in a deadly confrontation with Agarta in her own arena.
